Name: Norma
description:
Norma is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Norma is 60 years old.

She has a crab cultured business in the Philippines. Norma requested a PHP 20,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional materials like fishing nets, bamboo logs and etc. for the maintenance of her crab cultured business.

Norma would like to save enough to build a house for her family.
